backend_django.services.redis¶

Part of Semper-KI software

Silvio Weging 2023

Contains: Services for using the key-value store in redis

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

addContent(key, content)

Save a key and its content in redis.

deleteKey(key)

Delete key and value from redis by key.

retrieveContent(key[, deleteOrNot])

Retrieve content from redis by key.

Attributes¶

redis_instance

backend_django.services.redis.redis_instance¶
backend_django.services.redis.addContent(key, content)¶

Save a key and its content in redis.

Parameters:

  • key (String) – key, usually a session ID

  • content (Differs, will be set to binary here) – The stuff that should be saved

Returns:

Either “true” if it worked or an error if not

Return type:

Bool

backend_django.services.redis.deleteKey(key)¶

Delete key and value from redis by key.

Parameters:

key (String) – key, usually a session ID

Returns:

Flag to show if it worked or not

Return type:

Bool

backend_django.services.redis.retrieveContent(key, deleteOrNot=False)¶

Retrieve content from redis by key.

Parameters:

  • key (String) – key, usually a session ID

  • deleteOrNot (Bool) – Decides if the key:content pair should be deleted after retrieval

Returns:

content

Return type:

Differs, not binary

KISS-backend
